column1: #Text=Sokka says : " I was so relieved when it was over , but that 's because I did n't know yet what had happened .
#Text=Can you remember any details about the soldiers who raided your village ?
#Text=Like what the lead ship looked like ?
#Text=The main ship had flags with sea ravens on them .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The symbol of the Southern Raiders .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I waited out here all night .
#Text=" Katara says : " What do you want ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " I know who killed your mother , and I 'm going to help you find him .
